org.mini2Dx.core.geom

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Point
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2>, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CollisionPoint

    public class Point
extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2
    Extends Vector2 with some utility methods

      • isOnLineBetween

        public boolean isOnLineBetween(Point a,
                      Point b)
        Returns if this Point is between a and b on a line
        Parameters:
        a - Point a on a line
        b - Point b on a line
        Returns:
        False if this Point is not on the same line as a and b OR is not between a and b on the same line

      • equals

        public boolean equals(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 v)
        Determines if another Vector2 is exactly equal to this one
        Parameters:
        v - The Vector2 to compare to
        Returns:
        True if both Vector2s x and y are exactly equal

      • equals

        public boolean equals(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 v,
             float delta)
        Determines if this and a Vector2 are nearly equal. A delta of 0.1 means 0.0 and 0.1 would be considered equal but 0.0 and 0.11 would not.
        Parameters:
        v - The Vector2 to compare to
        delta - The amount of error to allow for.
        Returns:
        True if the two points are equal allowing for a certain margin of error

      • equals

        public boolean equals(float x,
             float y,
             float delta)
        Determines if a coordinate is nearly equal to this one. A delta of 0.1 means 0.0 and 0.1 would be considered equal but 0.0 and 0.11 would not.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate
        y - The y coordinate
        delta - The amount of error to allow for.
        Returns:
        True if the two points are equal allowing for a certain margin of error
